20110106020053.000|20110106020059.000|CC1|AGE AFFECTS ADOLESCENT BRAINS.

20110106020104.000|20110106020105.000|CC1|HOW YOUR BRAIN WAS WIRED GROWING
20110106020105.000|20110106020106.000|CC1|UP.

20110106020140.000|20110106020142.000|CC1|NEWSHOUR HAS BEEN PROVIDED BY:  
20110106020142.000|20110106020143.000|CC1|>> FOR THREE HOURS A WEEK, I'M A
20110106020143.000|20110106020143.000|CC1|COACH, BUT WHEN I WAS DIAGNOSED 
20110106020143.000|20110106020144.000|CC1|WITH PROSTATE CANCER, I NEEDED A
20110106020144.000|20110106020145.000|CC1|COACH.                          
20110106020145.000|20110106020146.000|CC1|OUR DOCTOR WAS GREAT, BUT WITH  
20110106020146.000|20110106020147.000|CC1|SO MANY TOUGH DECISIONS, I FELT 
20110106020147.000|20110106020148.000|CC1|LOST.                           
20110106020148.000|20110106020149.000|CC1|UNITED HEALTHCARE OFFERED A     
20110106020149.000|20110106020150.000|CC1|SPECIALLY TRAINED R.N., WHO     
20110106020150.000|20110106020151.000|CC1|HELPED US WEIGH AND UNDERSTAND  
20110106020151.000|20110106020153.000|CC1|ALL OUR OPTIONS.                
20110106020153.000|20110106020154.000|CC1|FOR ME, CANCER WAS AS SCARY AS A
20110106020154.000|20110106020155.000|CC1|FASTBALL IS TO SOME OF THESE    
20110106020155.000|20110106020156.000|CC1|KIDS, BUT MY COACH HAD HIT THAT 
20110106020156.000|20110106020159.000|CC1|PITCH BEFORE.

20110106020200.000|20110106020201.000|CC1|ANSWERS.

20110106020202.000|20110106020204.000|CC1|FOR 70 MILLION AMERICANS.

20110106020339.000|20110106020340.000|CC1|>> Reporter: THE 61-YEAR-OLD    
20110106020340.000|20110106020341.000|CC1|BOEHNER ASCENDED THE STEPS TO   
20110106020341.000|20110106020343.000|CC1|POWER TODAY AS HE BEGAN HIS 21st
20110106020343.000|20110106020345.000|CC1|YEAR IN CONGRESS, REPRESENTING  
20110106020345.000|20110106020348.000|CC1|PART OF SUBURBAN CINCINNATI.

20110106020349.000|20110106020351.000|CC1|CALIFORNIA DEMOCRAT NANCY

20110106020355.000|20110106020357.000|CC1|ELECTED TO BE SPEAKER.

20110106020405.000|20110106020406.000|CC1|SPEAKER, GOD BLESS YOU SPEAKER

20110106020406.000|20110106020409.000|CC1|( APPLAUSE )                    
20110106020409.000|20110106020410.000|CC1|>> Reporter: BOEHNER ADDRESSED A
20110106020410.000|20110106020412.000|CC1|HOUSE WITH 96 NEW MEMBERS,      
20110106020412.000|20110106020414.000|CC1|NEARLY ALL OF THEM REPUBLICANS. 
20110106020414.000|20110106020416.000|CC1|AND HE SAID THE MISSION OF THE  
20110106020416.000|20110106020418.000|CC1|112th CONGRESS IS CLEAR.        
20110106020418.000|20110106020419.000|CC1|>> WE GATHER HERE TODAY AT A    
20110106020419.000|20110106020423.000|CC1|TIME OF GREAT CHALLENGES.       
20110106020423.000|20110106020424.000|CC1|NEARLY IN-- ONE IN 10 OF OUR    
20110106020424.000|20110106020425.000|CC1|NEIGHBORS IS OUT OF WORK.       
20110106020425.000|20110106020426.000|CC1|HEALTH CARE COSTS ARE STILL     
20110106020426.000|20110106020429.000|CC1|RISING FOR AMERICAN FAMILIES.   
20110106020429.000|20110106020430.000|CC1|OUR SPENDING HAS CAUGHT UP WITH 
20110106020430.000|20110106020432.000|CC1|US, AND OUR DEBT SOON WILL      
20110106020432.000|20110106020434.000|CC1|ECLIPSE THE ENTIRE SIZE OF OUR  
20110106020434.000|20110106020438.000|CC1|NATIONAL ECONOMY.

20110106020440.000|20110106020443.000|CC1|CONGRESS.                       
20110106020443.000|20110106020446.000|CC1|NO LONGER CAN WE FALL SHORT.    
20110106020446.000|20110106020448.000|CC1|NO LONGER CAN WE KICK THE CAN   
20110106020448.000|20110106020452.000|CC1|DOWN THE ROAD.                  
20110106020452.000|20110106020454.000|CC1|THE PEOPLE VOTED TO END BUSINESS
20110106020454.000|20110106020456.000|CC1|AS USUAL, AND TODAY WE BEGIN TO 
20110106020456.000|20110106020458.000|CC1|CARRY OUT THEIR INSTRUCTIONS.   
20110106020458.000|20110106020500.000|CC1|( CHEERS AND APPLAUSE )         
20110106020500.000|20110106020501.000|CC1|>> Reporter: BOEHNER SAID       
20110106020501.000|20110106020502.000|CC1|REPUBLICANS INTEND TO FOLLOW    
20110106020502.000|20110106020503.000|CC1|THROUGH ON A PLEDGE TO RUN THE  
20110106020503.000|20110106020504.000|CC1|HOUSE IN A MORE TRANSPARENT     
20110106020504.000|20110106020507.000|CC1|MANNER.                         
20110106020507.000|20110106020510.000|CC1|>> OUR AIM WILL BE TO GIVE THE  
20110106020510.000|20110106020510.000|CC1|IN SEEKING THIS GOAL, WE WILL   
20110106020510.000|20110106020512.000|CC1|PART WITH SOME OF THE RITUALS   
20110106020512.000|20110106020513.000|CC1|THAT HAVE COME TO CHARACTERIZE  
20110106020513.000|20110106020515.000|CC1|THIS INSTITUTION UNDER          
20110106020515.000|20110106020517.000|CC1|MAJORITIES BOTH REPUBLICAN AND  
20110106020517.000|20110106020519.000|CC1|DEMOCRAT ALIKE.                 
20110106020519.000|20110106020521.000|CC1|WE WILL DISPENSE WITH THE       
20110106020521.000|20110106020522.000|CC1|CONVENTIONAL WISDOM THAT BIGGER 
20110106020522.000|20110106020526.000|CC1|BILLS ARE ALWAYS BETTER; THAT   
20110106020526.000|20110106020528.000|CC1|FAST LEGISLATING IS GOOD        
20110106020528.000|20110106020529.000|CC1|LEGISLATING; ALLOWING AMENDMENTS
20110106020529.000|20110106020530.000|CC1|AND OPEN DEBATE MAKES THE       
20110106020530.000|20110106020532.000|CC1|LEGISLATIVE PROCESS LESS        
20110106020532.000|20110106020534.000|CC1|EFFICIENT THAN OUR FOREFATHERS  
20110106020534.000|20110106020537.000|CC1|INTENDED.                       
20110106020537.000|20110106020538.000|CC1|THESE MISCONCEPTIONS HAVE BEEN  
20110106020538.000|20110106020540.000|CC1|THE BASIS FOR THE RITUALS OF A  
20110106020540.000|20110106020544.000|CC1|MODERN WASHINGTON.              
20110106020544.000|20110106020544.000|CC1|>> Reporter: AT THE SAME TIME,  
20110106020544.000|20110106020545.000|CC1|THE NEW SPEAKER ACKNOWLEDGED    
20110106020545.000|20110106020547.000|CC1|IT'S NOT GOING TO BE EASY TO    
20110106020547.000|20110106020549.000|CC1|FIND A BIPARTISAN WAY OF DOING  
20110106020549.000|20110106020552.000|CC1|BUSINESS.                       
20110106020552.000|20110106020553.000|CC1|>> THERE'S A GREAT DEAL OF SCAR 
20110106020553.000|20110106020554.000|CC1|TISSUE THAT'S BEEN BUILT UP ON  
20110106020554.000|20110106020554.000|CC1|BOTH SIDES OF THE AISLE.        
20110106020554.000|20110106020555.000|CC1|WE CAN'T IGNORE THAT, NOR SHOULD
20110106020555.000|20110106020556.000|CC1|WE.                             
20110106020556.000|20110106020558.000|CC1|MY BELIEF HAS ALWAYS BEEN THAT  
20110106020558.000|20110106020559.000|CC1|WE CAN DISAGREE WITHOUT BEING   
20110106020559.000|20110106020602.000|CC1|DISAGREEABLE.                   
20110106020602.000|20110106020604.000|CC1|NOW, THAT'S WHY IT'S CRITICAL

20110106020606.000|20110106020607.000|CC1|A MANNER THAT PERMITS A FREE    
20110106020607.000|20110106020609.000|CC1|EXCHANGE OF IDEAS AND RESOLVES  
20110106020609.000|20110106020610.000|CC1|OUR HONEST DIFFERENCES THROUGH A
20110106020610.000|20110106020619.000|CC1|FAIR DEBATE AND VOTE.           
20110106020619.000|20110106020622.000|CC1|>> Reporter: BY TRADITION,      
20110106020622.000|20110106020623.000|CC1|MICHIGAN DEMOCRAT JOHN DINGELL, 
20110106020623.000|20110106020625.000|CC1|THE DEAN OF THE HOUSE, THEN     
20110106020625.000|20110106020626.000|CC1|PROCEEDED TO ADMINISTER THE OATH
20110106020626.000|20110106020630.000|CC1|OF OFFICE TO BOEHNER.           
20110106020630.000|20110106020631.000|CC1|>> "THAT I WILL WELL AND        
20110106020631.000|20110106020633.000|CC1|FAITHFULLY DISCHARGE THE DUTIES 
20110106020633.000|20110106020636.000|CC1|OF THE OFFICE ON WHICH I AM     
20110106020636.000|20110106020636.000|CC1|ABOUT TO ENTER-- SO HELP ME     
20110106020636.000|20110106020638.000|CC1|GOD."                           
20110106020638.000|20110106020638.000|CC1|>> I DO.                        
20110106020638.000|20110106020642.000|CC1|( APPLAUSE )                    
20110106020642.000|20110106020642.000|CC1|>> Reporter: AND WITH THAT, THE 
20110106020642.000|20110106020644.000|CC1|NEW SPEAKER ADMINISTERED THE    
20110106020644.000|20110106020646.000|CC1|OATH TO THE OTHER 241           
20110106020646.000|20110106020648.000|CC1|REPUBLICANS AND 193 DEMOCRATS   
20110106020648.000|20110106020654.000|CC1|WHO MAKE UP THE NEW HOUSE.      
20110106020654.000|20110106020656.000|CC1|BUT PARTISANSHIP WAS LARGELY OUT
20110106020656.000|20110106020658.000|CC1|OF VIEW ON THIS OPENING DAY, AS 
20110106020658.000|20110106020700.000|CC1|VETERANS ON BOTH SIDES OFFERED  
20110106020700.000|20110106020702.000|CC1|HOPEFUL ASSESSMENTS OF SPEAKER  
20110106020702.000|20110106020703.000|CC1|BOEHNER.                        
20110106020703.000|20110106020707.000|CC1|>> HE'S A PROFESSIONAL, BEEN IN 
20110106020707.000|20110106020708.000|CC1|I THINK THERE'S REASON TO HOPE  
20110106020708.000|20110106020708.000|CC1|THAT HE WILL UNDERSTAND HIS ROLE
20110106020708.000|20110106020709.000|CC1|AS A LEADER IS NOT JUST TO PLAY 
20110106020709.000|20110106020712.000|CC1|TO HIS BASE, BUT TO BRING HIS   
20110106020712.000|20110106020714.000|CC1|BASE ALONG TO COMPROMISES THAT  
20110106020714.000|20110106020722.000|CC1|WILL BE IN THE PUBLIC INTEREST. 
20110106020722.000|20110106020723.000|CC1|>> THE OPENNESS HE BRINGS TO THE
20110106020723.000|20110106020723.000|CC1|PROCESS WILL MEAN WE CAN        
20110106020723.000|20110106020724.000|CC1|ACTUALLY ARRIVE AT SOME         
20110106020724.000|20110106020725.000|CC1|CONSENSUS AND THEN BEGIN TO MOVE
20110106020725.000|20110106020726.000|CC1|FORWARD AND DO THE WORK ON      
20110106020726.000|20110106020726.000|CC1|BEHALF OF THE AMERICAN PEOPLE WE
20110106020726.000|20110106020727.000|CC1|WERE SENT HERE TO DO.           
20110106020727.000|20110106020728.000|CC1|>> Reporter: EMBOLDENED BY THEIR
20110106020728.000|20110106020729.000|CC1|NEW MAJORITY IN THE HOUSE,      
20110106020729.000|20110106020730.000|CC1|REPUBLICANS INTEND TO WASTE     
20110106020730.000|20110106020733.000|CC1|LITTLE TIME MAKING GOOD ON THEIR
20110106020733.000|20110106020734.000|CC1|CAMPAIGN PROMISES, LIKE         
20110106020734.000|20110106020735.000|CC1|REPEALING THE HEALTHCARE LAW    
20110106020735.000|20110106020738.000|CC1|PASSED LAST YEAR.               
20110106020738.000|20110106020739.000|CC1|SUCH MOVES WILL BE LARGELY      
20110106020739.000|20110106020741.000|CC1|SYMBOLIC THOUGH, AS DEMOCRATS   
20110106020741.000|20110106020743.000|CC1|STILL CONTROL THE SENATE.       
20110106020743.000|20110106020745.000|CC1|LEADERS THERE HAVE PLEDGED TO   
20110106020745.000|20110106020746.000|CC1|BLOCK REPUBLICAN EFFORTS TO ROLL
20110106020746.000|20110106020747.000|CC1|BACK PRESIDENT OBAMA'S          
20110106020747.000|20110106020756.000|CC1|INITIATIVES.                    
20110106020756.000|20110106020758.000|CC1|TODAY, THOUGH, THE SENATE, TOO, 
20110106020758.000|20110106020801.000|CC1|WAS PREOCCUPIED WITH CEREMONY-- 
20110106020801.000|20110106020803.000|CC1|THE SWEARING-IN OF NEW MEMBERS  
20110106020803.000|20110106020805.000|CC1|AND THOSE WHO WON REELECTION.   
20110106020805.000|20110106020807.000|CC1|REPUBLICANS GAINED SIX SEATS,   
20110106020807.000|20110106020809.000|CC1|FOR A TOTAL OF 47.              
20110106020809.000|20110106020813.000|CC1|DEMOCRATS WILL CONTROL 53,      
20110106020813.000|20110106020815.000|CC1|INCLUDING FIVE-TERMER BARBARA   
20110106020815.000|20110106020817.000|CC1|MIKULSKI, NOW THE LONGEST-      
20110106020817.000|20110106020819.000|CC1|SERVING WOMAN IN SENATE HISTORY.
20110106020819.000|20110106020821.000|CC1|>> FOR ME, IT'S ALL ABOUT       
20110106020821.000|20110106020823.000|CC1|SERVICE.                        
20110106020823.000|20110106020825.000|CC1|FIGHTING FOR A STRONGER ECONOMY,
20110106020825.000|20110106020827.000|CC1|SAFER AMERICA.                  
20110106020827.000|20110106020828.000|CC1|NOT ABOUT THE PAST, IT'S ABOUT  
20110106020828.000|20110106020831.000|CC1|THE FUTURE.                     
20110106020831.000|20110106020832.000|CC1|>> Reporter: THE SENATE'S FIRST 
20110106020832.000|20110106020833.000|CC1|ORDER OF BUSINESS WAS BEGINNING 
20110106020833.000|20110106020833.000|CC1|A DEBATE OVER RULES THAT GOVERN 
20110106020833.000|20110106020835.000|CC1|DEBATE.                         
20110106020835.000|20110106020837.000|CC1|MAJORITY LEADER HARRY REID AND  
20110106020837.000|20110106020838.000|CC1|OTHER DEMOCRATS WANT TO REIN IN 
20110106020838.000|20110106020845.000|CC1|REPEATED FILIBUSTERS.           
20110106020845.000|20110106020845.000|CC1|>> NO ONE CAN DENY THAT THE     
20110106020845.000|20110106020846.000|CC1|FILIBUSTER HAS BEEN USED FOR    
20110106020846.000|20110106020847.000|CC1|PURELY POLITICAL REASONS--      
20110106020847.000|20110106020848.000|CC1|REASONS FAR BEYOND THOSE FOR    
20110106020848.000|20110106020849.000|CC1|WHICH THIS PROTECTION WAS       
20110106020849.000|20110106020852.000|CC1|INVENTED AND INTENDED.          
20110106020852.000|20110106020853.000|CC1|>> Reporter: IN TURN, REPUBLICAN
20110106020853.000|20110106020856.000|CC1|LEADER MITCH McCONNELL INSISTED 
20110106020856.000|20110106020857.000|CC1|THE PUBLIC WANTS MORE DEBATE,   
20110106020857.000|20110106020904.000|CC1|NOT LESS.

20110106023218.000|20110106023219.000|CC1|PENALTY FOR DOING MORE, TWO

20110106024028.000|20110106024030.000|CC1|THEN PRAISED BY HUNDREDS IS     
20110106024030.000|20110106024032.000|CC1|UNHEARD OF IN A COUNT REEVE     
20110106024032.000|20110106024034.000|CC1|WHICH HAS TRADITIONALLY BEEN    
20110106024034.000|20110106024036.000|CC1|FAIRLY MODERATE IN TERMS OF     
20110106024036.000|20110106024037.000|CC1|THE MUSLIM WORLD.               
20110106024037.000|20110106024040.000|CC1|>> MOST AREN'T FAMILIAR WITH    
20110106024040.000|20110106024041.000|CC1|HIM.                            
20110106024041.000|20110106024041.000|CC1|TELL US ABOUT HIM?              
20110106024041.000|20110106024046.000|CC1|>> A BUOYANT OUTSPOKEN          
20110106024046.000|20110106024046.000|CC1|LIBERAL.                        
20110106024046.000|20110106024049.000|CC1|STARTED IN THE 70s AS A         
20110106024049.000|20110106024051.000|CC1|STUDENT, AND CLEARLY TOOK A

20110106024055.000|20110106024057.000|CC1|THE LAW, BUT THE FACT IT WAS

20110106024809.000|20110106024811.000|CC1|SENTENCE ABOUT YOU.             
20110106024811.000|20110106024813.000|CC1|THIS, MY 8X10 CAMERA.           
20110106024813.000|20110106024814.000|CC1|"HE'S THE GUY THAT PHOTOGRAPHS  
20110106024814.000|20110106024816.000|CC1|WEIMARANERS."                   
20110106024816.000|20110106024817.000|CC1|"SHE WAS A STUDENT OF SO AND    
20110106024817.000|20110106024820.000|CC1|SO."                            
20110106024820.000|20110106024821.000|CC1|FOR BETTER OF WORSE, THIS CAMERA
20110106024821.000|20110106024823.000|CC1|SORT OF BECAME MY TRADEMARK.    
20110106024823.000|20110106024825.000|CC1|AND YOU CAN'T REALLY CREATE THAT
20110106024825.000|20110106024826.000|CC1|SENTENCE, BUT YOU CAN SORT OF   
20110106024826.000|20110106024831.000|CC1|HELP DETERMINE WHAT IT'S NOT.   
20110106024831.000|20110106024835.000|CC1|MY FAVORITE THING ABOUT IT IS   
20110106024835.000|20110106024836.000|CC1|ACTUALLY LOOKING THROUGH IT.    
20110106024836.000|20110106024837.000|CC1|THERE'S JUST SOMETHING REALLY   
20110106024837.000|20110106024838.000|CC1|BEAUTIFUL ABOUT THE WAY IT      
20110106024838.000|20110106024840.000|CC1|RENDERS SPACE.                  
20110106024840.000|20110106024843.000|CC1|>> ALEC SOTH IS AN ARTIST WHO   
20110106024843.000|20110106024846.000|CC1|USES PHOTOGRAPHY TO REALLY TELL 
20110106024846.000|20110106024847.000|CC1|STORIES, BUT HE'S DOING THIS IN 
20110106024847.000|20110106024848.000|CC1|A WAY THAT IS NOT THE           
20110106024848.000|20110106024849.000|CC1|TRADITIONAL TYPE OF STORYTELLING
20110106024849.000|20110106024850.000|CC1|WITH PHOTOGRAPHY.               
20110106024850.000|20110106024853.000|CC1|HIS IDEA OF FINDING THE BEAUTY  
20110106024853.000|20110106024855.000|CC1|IN THE UNEXPECTED, LOOKING IN   
20110106024855.000|20110106024856.000|CC1|OUT-OF-THE-WAY PLACES FOR       
20110106024856.000|20110106024900.000|CC1|SUBJECTS AND SCENES THAT SOMEHOW
20110106024900.000|20110106024900.000|CC1|EVOKED AN AMERICA OR A PLACE    
20110106024900.000|20110106024903.000|CC1|THAT PEOPLE WOULD NOT REALLY    
20110106024903.000|20110106024909.000|CC1|ANTICIPATE.                     
20110106024909.000|20110106024911.000|CC1|>> I'VE ALWAYS HAD A REAL       
20110106024911.000|20110106024911.000|CC1|PROBLEM WITH THE MEDIUM OF      
20110106024911.000|20110106024913.000|CC1|PHOTOGRAPHY.                    
20110106024913.000|20110106024916.000|CC1|I WAS A PAINFULLY SHY PERSON, SO
20110106024916.000|20110106024917.000|CC1|IT'S REALLY STRANGE THAT I'VE   
20110106024917.000|20110106024917.000|CC1|MADE A LIFE OUT OF APPROACHING  
20110106024917.000|20110106024920.000|CC1|STRANGERS.                      
20110106024920.000|20110106024921.000|CC1|AND PHOTOGRAPHY IS AN INCREDIBLY
20110106024921.000|20110106024925.000|CC1|LIMITING MEDIUM.                
20110106024925.000|20110106024928.000|CC1|BEING FROZEN IN TIME MEANS YOU  
20110106024928.000|20110106024928.000|CC1|CAN'T REALLY TELL STORIES.      
20110106024928.000|20110106024931.000|CC1|YOU KNOW?                       
20110106024931.000|20110106024933.000|CC1|IT'S VERY FRAGMENTARY.          
20110106024933.000|20110106024934.000|CC1|IN A WORLD, YEAH, WHERE THERE   
20110106024934.000|20110106024937.000|CC1|500,000 PICTURES A SECOND BEING 
20110106024937.000|20110106024938.000|CC1|UPLOADED ONTO FACEBOOK, YOU     
20110106024938.000|20110106024940.000|CC1|KNOW, WHAT DOES IT MEAN TO BE A 
20110106024940.000|20110106024940.000|CC1|PHOTOGRAPHER IN THAT            
20110106024940.000|20110106024943.000|CC1|ENVIRONMENT?                    
20110106024943.000|20110106024945.000|CC1|>> IN 2004, ALEC WAS CHOSEN AS  
20110106024945.000|20110106024947.000|CC1|ONE OF THE ARTISTS IN THE       
20110106024947.000|20110106024948.000|CC1|WHITNEY BIENNIAL, WHICH IS A    
20110106024948.000|20110106024949.000|CC1|SHOWCASE NATIONALLY OF AMERICAN 
20110106024949.000|20110106024951.000|CC1|ARTISTS.                        
20110106024951.000|20110106024952.000|CC1|IT'S A SHOW MEANT TO TAKE THE   
20110106024952.000|20110106024953.000|CC1|PULSE OF WHAT'S HAPPENING IN    
20110106024953.000|20110106024955.000|CC1|AMERICAN ART, AND IT INCLUDES A 
20110106024955.000|20110106024956.000|CC1|SPECTRUM OF ARTISTS FROM        
20110106024956.000|20110106024959.000|CC1|EMERGING TO WELL-KNOWN, AND FOR 
20110106024959.000|20110106025000.000|CC1|A VIRTUAL UNKNOWN AS HE WAS AT  
20110106025000.000|20110106025003.000|CC1|THAT TIME, IT WAS A HUGE        
20110106025003.000|20110106025004.000|CC1|LAUNCHING PAD.                  
20110106025004.000|20110106025006.000|CC1|>> I'M PREPARING FOR AN         
20110106025006.000|20110106025008.000|CC1|EXHIBITION AT THE WALKER ART    
20110106025008.000|20110106025009.000|CC1|CENTER.                         
20110106025009.000|20110106025010.000|CC1|IT'S A BIG SURVEY SHOW, WORK    
20110106025010.000|20110106025013.000|CC1|FROM ALL OVER AMERICA.          
20110106025013.000|20110106025014.000|CC1|WHAT I WANTED TO DO WITH THE    
20110106025014.000|20110106025015.000|CC1|SHOW AT THE WALKER IS NOT HAVE  
20110106025015.000|20110106025016.000|CC1|IT BE A RETROSPECTIVE BECAUSE I 
20110106025016.000|20110106025018.000|CC1|DON'T THINK I'M OLD ENOUGH FOR A
20110106025018.000|20110106025019.000|CC1|RETROSPECTIVE, AND I WANTED TO  
20110106025019.000|20110106025025.000|CC1|GIVE IT SOME SORT OF SHAPE.     
20110106025025.000|20110106025026.000|CC1|TO BE A LOCAL ARTIST, IT'S      
20110106025026.000|20110106025027.000|CC1|REALLY HARD TO MAKE IT AT THE   
20110106025027.000|20110106025029.000|CC1|LOCAL INSTITUTION.              
20110106025029.000|20110106025030.000|CC1|YOU SORT OF HAVE TO MAKE IT OUT 
20110106025030.000|20110106025030.000|CC1|THERE BEFORE YOU CAN MAKE IT    
20110106025030.000|20110106025033.000|CC1|HERE.                           
20110106025033.000|20110106025035.000|CC1|THIS SHOW AT THE WALKER, FOR ME 
20110106025035.000|20110106025053.000|CC1|IT'S A REALLY BIG DEAL.         
20110106025053.000|20110106025053.000|CC1|THIS IS THE FIRST ROOM THAT YOU 
20110106025053.000|20110106025054.000|CC1|SEE WHEN YOU WALK INTO THE      
20110106025054.000|20110106025059.000|CC1|EXHIBITION, AND THIS ROOM IS ALL
20110106025059.000|20110106025100.000|CC1|WORK FROM MY PROJECT "SLEEPING  
20110106025100.000|20110106025102.000|CC1|BY THE MISSISSIPPI," WHICH IS   
20110106025102.000|20110106025103.000|CC1|REALLY THE FIRST SIGNIFICANT    
20110106025103.000|20110106025105.000|CC1|BODY OF WORK THAT I DID AND SORT
20110106025105.000|20110106025106.000|CC1|OF HOW I MADE MY NAME AND ALL   
20110106025106.000|20110106025109.000|CC1|THAT KIND OF STUFF.             
20110106025109.000|20110106025110.000|CC1|SO IN HERE THEN IS MY SECOND    
20110106025110.000|20110106025111.000|CC1|BODY OF WORK THAT FOLLOWED UP ON
20110106025111.000|20110106025114.000|CC1|"SLEEPING BY THE MISSISSIPPI."  
20110106025114.000|20110106025115.000|CC1|IT'S ENTITLED "NIAGRA."         
20110106025115.000|20110106025117.000|CC1|WITH THIS WORK, I REALLY WANTED 
20110106025117.000|20110106025118.000|CC1|EVEN MORE SCALE.                
20110106025118.000|20110106025120.000|CC1|I WANTED THE VIEWER TO HAVE THIS
20110106025120.000|20110106025121.000|CC1|REAL PHYSICAL REACTION TO THE   
20110106025121.000|20110106025124.000|CC1|WORK.                           
20110106025124.000|20110106025125.000|CC1|ON THE FLIP SIDE, I ALSO DID    
20110106025125.000|20110106025127.000|CC1|PORTRAITS, SOMETIMES OF         
20110106025127.000|20110106025128.000|CC1|NEWLYWEDS AND HONEYMOONERS AND  
20110106025128.000|20110106025130.000|CC1|THAT SORT OF THING.             
20110106025130.000|20110106025132.000|CC1|THIS IS MAYBE MY FAVORITE       
20110106025132.000|20110106025133.000|CC1|PICTURE FROM "NIAGARA."         
20110106025133.000|20110106025135.000|CC1|HER NAME IS MELISSA.            
20110106025135.000|20110106025137.000|CC1|WHAT I LOVE ABOUT IT IS THE WAY 
20110106025137.000|20110106025139.000|CC1|THAT THE DRESS, THIS BILLOWING  
20110106025139.000|20110106025141.000|CC1|DRESS, IT KIND OF MIMICS THE    
20110106025141.000|20110106025143.000|CC1|MIST OF THE FALLS IN A WAY.     
20110106025143.000|20110106025146.000|CC1|MY INTEREST IN THE FALLS HAS TO 
20110106025146.000|20110106025148.000|CC1|DO WITH THIS WEIRD RELATIONSHIP 
20110106025148.000|20110106025149.000|CC1|BETWEEN IT BEING A PLACE TO GET 
20110106025149.000|20110106025151.000|CC1|MARRIED AND A PLACE TO COMMIT   
20110106025151.000|20110106025153.000|CC1|SUICIDE.                        
20110106025153.000|20110106025156.000|CC1|WHY DO PEOPLE CHOOSE THIS       
20110106025156.000|20110106025158.000|CC1|INCREDIBLY FORCEFUL,            
20110106025158.000|20110106025201.000|CC1|FRIGHTENING, POWERFUL WATERFALL 
20110106025201.000|20110106025204.000|CC1|AS A METAPHOR FOR NEW LOVE?     
20110106025204.000|20110106025206.000|CC1|THIS ONE IS CALLED "33 MOVIE    
20110106025206.000|20110106025208.000|CC1|THEATERS AND A FUNERAL HOME."   
20110106025208.000|20110106025211.000|CC1|ALL OF THEM WERE MADE IN TEXAS. 
20110106025211.000|20110106025212.000|CC1|THERE'S A MAP SHOWING MY JOURNEY
20110106025212.000|20110106025213.000|CC1|AROUND TEXAS TO PHOTOGRAPH THESE
20110106025213.000|20110106025216.000|CC1|MOVIE THEATERS.                 
20110106025216.000|20110106025218.000|CC1|SO I THOUGHT OF THIS WHOLE      
20110106025218.000|20110106025219.000|CC1|EXHIBITION AS BEING THIS KIND OF
20110106025219.000|20110106025221.000|CC1|GEOGRAPHICAL JOURNEY, AND I     
20110106025221.000|20110106025224.000|CC1|WANTED TO INCLUDE ONE ROOM THAT 
20110106025224.000|20110106025227.000|CC1|WAS HOME, AND SO ALL THESE      
20110106025227.000|20110106025231.000|CC1|PICTURES ARE MADE IN MINNESOTA. 
20110106025231.000|20110106025233.000|CC1|EVERY YEAR AT FALL, I'M LIKE,   
20110106025233.000|20110106025234.000|CC1|I'M GOING TO FINALLY DO THE     
20110106025234.000|20110106025236.000|CC1|MINNESOTA WINTER PROJECT THAT   
20110106025236.000|20110106025237.000|CC1|I'VE BEEN DREAMING OF, AND THEN 
20110106025237.000|20110106025239.000|CC1|IT GETS REALLY COLD, I'M LIKE,  
20110106025239.000|20110106025240.000|CC1|THIS SUCKS, AND I DON'T DO IT.  
20110106025240.000|20110106025241.000|CC1|BUT SOME YEAR, I AIM TO DO IT.  
20110106025241.000|20110106025244.000|CC1|SO THIS IS MY EXHIBITION WITHIN 
20110106025244.000|20110106025249.000|CC1|AN EXHIBITION CALLED "BROKEN    
20110106025249.000|20110106025250.000|CC1|MANUAL," AND WHAT IT IS IS      
20110106025250.000|20110106025255.000|CC1|EXPLORATION ON THE IDEA OF      
20110106025255.000|20110106025255.000|CC1|WANTING TO RUN AWAY, WANTING TO 
20110106025255.000|20110106025258.000|CC1|DISAPPEAR.                      
20110106025258.000|20110106025259.000|CC1|IN THE END-- AND I SAW THIS OVER
20110106025259.000|20110106025300.000|CC1|AND OVER AGAIN WITH THE PEOPLE I
20110106025300.000|20110106025303.000|CC1|MET-- YOU NEED OTHER PEOPLE, AND
20110106025303.000|20110106025304.000|CC1|THERE'S ALWAYS SOME CONNECTION  
20110106025304.000|20110106025306.000|CC1|TO SOCIETY.                     
20110106025306.000|20110106025308.000|CC1|OVER HERE IS THE REAL FANTASY OF
20110106025308.000|20110106025312.000|CC1|WHERE I WOULD RUN AWAY TO, IF I 
20110106025312.000|20110106025314.000|CC1|WERE TO RUN AWAY.               
20110106025314.000|20110106025315.000|CC1|IT'S CALLED "LOST BOY MOUNTAIN."
20110106025315.000|20110106025318.000|CC1|UP HERE IS A TREE HOUSE WITH A  
20110106025318.000|20110106025321.000|CC1|BED, AND DOWN BELOW, YOU GO DOWN
20110106025321.000|20110106025323.000|CC1|THE STEPS, AND THEN THERE'S A   
20110106025323.000|20110106025326.000|CC1|LADDER INSIDE THAT TAKES YOU    
20110106025326.000|20110106025327.000|CC1|DOWN INTO A CAVE.               
20110106025327.000|20110106025328.000|CC1|I HAVE THIS REALLY STRONG MEMORY
20110106025328.000|20110106025330.000|CC1|OF BEING IN HIGH SCHOOL WHEN I  
20110106025330.000|20110106025333.000|CC1|FIRST GOT INTERESTED IN ART, AND

20110106025337.000|20110106025340.000|CC1|EXHIBITION, IT FELT SO ALIVE TO 
20110106025340.000|20110106025343.000|CC1|ME, AND THE THOUGHT THAT I'M NOW

20110106025345.000|20110106025348.000|CC1|AND POTENTIALLY THERE'S GOING TO
20110106025348.000|20110106025349.000|CC1|BE SOME TEENAGER WHO'S GOING TO 
20110106025349.000|20110106025350.000|CC1|DRAW FROM IT.
